A1: all its diplomats over security concerns in Libya
RelatedSentence: TEHRAN ( FNA ) - Saudi Arabia closed its embassy in Tripoli on Monday and evacuated all its diplomats over security concerns in Libya .

The Saudi ambassador to Libya Mohammed Mahmud al - Ali told the SPA state news agency that the kingdom 's consulate in Libya was also closed due to the current circumstances and the security situation .
